text: Even seasoned royal correspondents have been left exhausted and in awe of Meghan ’ s work ethic, despite a number pitfalls including warnings against travelling while pregnant. Writing for Australian news website, Honey, an exhausted Juliet Rieden told of how this tour has seen the royal couple gain an international seal of approval, while sending “ her circadian rhythms into meltdown. ” She said : “ As a seasoned royal correspondent, I like to think I ’ m well versed in the madness and mayhem of royal tours but this inaugural Commonwealth love - in with the Duke and Duchess of Sussex had surprises at every turn and a pace that has sent my circadian rhythms into meltdown. “ It started with a baby announcement that blind - sided us all.
